ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals and restores Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Rum from Baron Samedi's personal cabinet. This consumable heals 140 Health and 100 Mana over 20 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Restores Health and Mana over time.
